sentences.sContent: Her flight will be rerouted via Tokyo.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her flight will be rerouted via Tokyo.
sentences.sCn: 她乘坐的航班将改变航线途经东京。

sentences.sContent: They are going from Shanghai to Los Angeles via Tokyo.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are going from Shanghai to Los Angeles via Tokyo.
sentences.sCn: 他们从上海经东京去洛杉矶。

sentences.sContent: On my way to New York, I stopped over in Tokyo for two days.
sentences.sContent_eng: On my way to New York, I stopped over in Tokyo for two days.
sentences.sCn: 我在去纽约的途中在东京停了两天。
